Detailed Description

DSS Global MFLAG Config parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_DssGlobalMFlagCfg::globalMflagCtrl

Mflag Control Signal. Refer CSL_DssMflagCtrl for values

uint32_t CSL_DssGlobalMFlagCfg::globalMflagStart

Mflag start for DMA master port, used to drive mflag signal when DMA buffer is empty at the beginning of pipeline. Refer CSL_DssMflagStartMode for values
